^(lastChangePasswordTime)$.description: The last time the user changed their password.

^(lastLoginTime)$.description: The last time the user successfully logged in.

last_change_password_time.description: The last time the user changed their password.

last_login_time.description: The last time the user successfully logged in.

source.description: source means where the user comes from. For now we support Entra ID SCIM sync, so the source could be Entra ID.
